name: Link Verification
description:
As a user,
  I want to verify the product page functionality,
  So that I can ensure that the product pages display the correct information and links.

steps.name: Then I am on the "Category" page
When I click on the product "FI-FW-02"
Then I am on the "Product" page
And The "href" value of the element should match the expected value:
And The href value of the item link "EST-20" should match the expected value:
And The href value of the add to cart button for item ID "EST-20" should match the expected value:
